content: the traveler s water bottle bag is designed to keep your hands free for all of your adventuring this bag is designed to fit snug so you don t have to worry about losing your water bottle and for ease of use so you can pick up the entire apparatus to use it versus having to pull the bottle out and put it back created with a mesh structure and cotton yarn this bottle bag is flexible washable and sturdy perfect for all of your adventures as of november 11 2022 this pattern has been updated the layout of the pdf has changed and the strap portion of this pattern has been updated to a much stronger form of strap additionally a minor change in the construction of the pattern was included none of these things change the usability of the previous version of the pattern skill level intermediate you will need to know how to work in the round work in chain spaces and double_crochet materials you will need between 100 and 140 yards of medium 4 cotton yarn depending on your size preference by purchasing this pattern you will receive 1 two pdf versions computer friendly with pictures & photo tutorial and printer friendly only one picture 2 instructions on how to alter the size make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love i m @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet i hope you love the traveler s bottle bag as much as i do happy crocheting the loophole fox
